titleInfo.title: Luke Bryan at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts

mods.abstract: Three color window card (blue-gray, blue and yellow on white) announcing Luke Bryan, Brett Eldredge, and Lauren Alaina for the Huntin' Fishin' and Lovin' Every Day Tour at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts on July 13. Poster features woodcuts of a fisherman and campfire.

subject.topic: Bethel Woods Center for the Arts
